display_long_description:
FindingVR is a first-person action/adventure game designed exclusively for VR.
Solve puzzles using your intelligence and dexterity, embark on adventures as you explore the virtual world and revel in the sense of achievement as you complete missions, and feel the rush of intense boss battles!
Your mission is to find out what happened to this world, and figure out how to save it. Start by defeating enemies who stand in your way, then find your way of the dungeon and defeat the final boss of each chapter to move onto the next stage.
You can use either the Touchpad or a Gamepad to play this exciting, deep, VR game. Finding VR might be the most challenging game you can play using only the Touchpad in Gear VR yet!
